channel.title: [Simple] NeedYou's Server Auto starter [Converted]
channel.description:
[B][size=24pt]Welcome![/size][/B]
Im releasing my auto restarter. I converted it With Windows 7 converter from .exe To .bat. (just did it for fun).
[b][Known Bugs][/b]
Loading Time of the auto restarter takes like 10seconds. (not really a bug.) And after 8 days of running the Cmd Will Exit him self (i dont know why.)
The auto starter, starts the server every hour. u can just easily edit it by your self in the cmd. The Auto-starter work's fine for me. (im Using PI).
[b][Picture][/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gJSnr.png[/img]
[b][Download][/b] http://dl.dropbox.com/u/33608733/run.bat
Feel free to thank me :D
[i]P.S: My Name On R-S is needyou, if u want proof just pm me on there.[/i]

item.title: [Simple] NeedYou's Server Auto starter [Converted]
item.dc:creator: @gino_pieter_ferat gino pieter ferat
item.description:
@gino_pieter_ferat wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:2, topic:410817”]Why let us download, and not just post the code if it is a batch file. Very… Suspicious.

Edit: People don’t download, this is not a restarter.[/quote]

Its converted to .Bat. cuz it was .exe. now if u edit the cmd u will get an really huge scroll from the auto restarter. its to big to post. and btw it makes this topic ugly

Read full topic

[size=24pt]Welcome![/size]

Im releasing my auto restarter. I converted it With Windows 7 converter from .exe To .bat. (just did it for fun).

[Known Bugs]

Loading Time of the auto restarter takes like 10seconds. (not really a bug.)
And after 8 days of running the Cmd Will Exit him self (i dont know why.)
